Need Help? [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Quote” module_class=”banner-sub-title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_line_height=”30px” header_font=”||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Hiahia awhina?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#4b858e” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#4b858e” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_font=”Zooja Pro|100|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#cccdce” header_3_font_size=”82px” header_3_letter_spacing=”-0.1px” header_3_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” header_3_font_size_tablet=”” header_3_font_size_phone=”48px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_3_line_height_tablet=”” header_3_line_height_phone=”1em” header_3_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Hi there, it’s great that you’re reaching out.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Quote” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If some of the stuff you’ve read on this site has made you feel anxious or worried, you think you might have a problem with porn, or you’re concerned about a young person in your life, you’ve come to the right place…

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row [/dsm_flipbox_child][/dsm_flipbox][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][dsm_flipbox flipbox_type=”fade” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” height=”288px” link_option_url=”/resources/” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_flipbox_child title=”Resources” alt=”The Light Project – Banner – Resources” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h5″ header_font=”Zooja Pro|300|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”0.7em” content_text_align=”center” subhead_text_align=”center” subhead_font_size=”17px” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(0,0,0,0.25) 100%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0.25)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”100%” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_image=”http://thelightproject.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Banner_resources-1024×658.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” background_layout=”dark” min_height=”288px” link_option_url=”/resources/” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_flipbox_child][dsm_flipbox_child alt=”Youth Page Banner” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h5″ header_font=”Zooja Pro|300|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” content_text_align=”center” content_line_height=”1.6em” subhead_text_align=”center” subhead_font_size=”26px” background_color=”#c9b382″ background_enable_color=”on” background_enable_image=”off” background_layout=”dark” min_height=”288px” custom_padding=”|30px||30px|false|true” link_option_url=”/resources/” global_colors_info=”{}”]A summary of recommended research articles, websites, books, parent resources, YouTube videos and guidelines. [/dsm_flipbox_child][/dsm_flipbox][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” module_class=”footer-quote-block” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F6F3EF” z_index=”2″ custom_margin=”||-15vh||false|false” custom_padding=”80px|80px|80px|80px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|20px|20px|20px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-1b27fc3d-7579-4286-975a-244b5a16c6f4%22:%91%93,%22gcid-a394b62d-6ad6-4a00-840a-6f56a4918f0b%22:%91%93}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_line_height=”1.9em” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”15px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]You know, you need people around you that are going to help you stop. Or, you know, find yourself a bunch of people that are going to encourage you to cut down. Tell your friends or someone you trust about it. You can’t hide it under the couch – try be vulnerable about it. And that’s what will help you stop.”[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_font_size=”14px” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]— NZ male, 19[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”#ffffff 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 30%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”30%” background_image=”http://thelightproject.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/BG_need_help.jpg” background_position=”top_center” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”500px” height_phone=”500px” height_last_edited=”on|phone” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”4.16″ height=”800px” height_tablet=”300px” height_phone=”200px” height_last_edited=”on|phone” max_height_tablet=”300px” max_height_phone=”200px” max_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: Need Help? Hiahia awhina?Hi there, it’s great that you’re reaching out.If some of the stuff you’ve read on this site has made you feel anxious or worried, you think you might have a problem with porn, or you’re concerned about a young person in your life, you’ve come to the right place…
